examples.text: Mr. <w>Bloomfield</w> has been teaching history at the college for over twenty years.
We invited the entire <w>Bloomfield</w> family to the wedding reception.

senses.sense_definition: A place name referring to various towns, cities, and communities, particularly in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom.

examples.text: They recently moved to a quiet suburb in <w>Bloomfield</w>.
The mayor of <w>Bloomfield</w> announced plans for a new community center.
